asChild.description: Merges its props onto its immediate child.

disabled.description: If `true`, the indicator will be disabled.

inline.description: If `true`, set the indicator as an inline element.

label.type: string | number | bigint | boolean | ReactElement<unknown, string | JSXElementConstructor<any>> | Iterable<ReactNode> | ReactPortal | Promise<...>

overflowCount.description: If `label` is of type number, the maximum number displayed.

ping.description: If `true`, make an element scale and fade like a radar ping or ripple of water.

withBorder.description: If `true`, display the border of the indicator.
